page.title: 13A Shopping Survey
page.content: One hundred adults of varying ages were asked a number of questions regarding their shopping habits. The 7 questions asked were:- 1. How many times a week do you go shopping? 2. Do you shop locally or do you go to a nearby town? 3. Do you shop in superstores? 4. Which superstores do you shop at? 5. How much on average do you spend on food each week? 6. How often do you go shopping in larger towns such as Newport, Cardiff, Swansea, Merthyr Tydfil 7. What are your favourite foods? The results showed that most people shop on average 3 times a week and that 54% compared with 46% who shop locally. Quite a high percentage 72% use superstores due to the close proximity of these shops being within
